flawed_nl_solution:
Henry and Paul collected a total of 11+24 = <<11+24=34>>34 seashells
To make a total of 59, Leo must have collected 59-34 = <<59-34=25>>25 seashells
He gave out a quarter of 25 seashells which is 25*(1/4) = <<25*(1/4)=25/4>>25/4 seashells
They are now left with 59-25/4 = <<59-25/4=211/4>>211/4 seashells
#### 211/4

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 35, not 34. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
